lyrics.stanza: When first I came here, they spoke of Jesus, Such things I never had heard before, But in my heart was a new sensation, Past explanation, such peace and warmth. My former troubles, all but forgotten, I left the bondage of earth unconsciously. I saw their faces, so pure and gen'uine, My heart said, "Truly God is here!"

They said God wanted to get inside me, My life, my Savior, if I'd allow; I'd never seen Him, I'd never known Him, I only knew this: "I need Him now!" So with a pure heart I turned my being, Called, "O, Lord Jesus!" Asked Him to save me. No other name is so sweet, so lovely; From that day forth, so real to me!

No more encumb'rance, true rest I enter, No condemnation, I'm justified, Joined to the Savior, my life forever, I live to God now, by faith have life; In Christ I glory, in Christ rejoicing, I'm one with Him, as a new creation, This is the story of my salvation, Such wond'rous love, such wond'rous song!
